2 #include "ros/ros.h"
3 #include "ros_robotic_skin/PointArray.h"
4 #include "visualization_msgs/Marker.h"
5 #include "visualization_msgs/MarkerArray.h"
6 #include "signal.h"
7 #include <ros/master.h>
8 
9 void on_shutdown(int sig);
10 class ProximityVisualizer {
11  private:
12  int num_sensors;
13  void Callback(const ros_robotic_skin::PointArray::ConstPtr& msg);
14  ros::NodeHandle n;
15  ros::Subscriber sub;
16  ros::Publisher pub;
17  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
18  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array;
19  public:
20  ProximityVisualizer();
21  ~ProximityVisualizer();
22  void start();
23  void stop();
24 };
25 
26 ProximityVisualizer::ProximityVisualizer() {
27  signal(SIGINT, on_shutdown);
28  if (!n.getParam("/num_sensors", num_sensors)) {
29  ROS_ERROR("Can't get number of sensors from the parameter server");
30  ros::shutdown();
31  }
32  sub = n.subscribe<ros_robotic_skin::PointArray>("live_points", 1, &ProximityVisualizer::Callback, this);
33  pub = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>("visualization_marker_array", 1);
34  // Same for all markers
35  marker.ns = "Live Points";
36  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
37  marker.scale.x = 0.05;
38  marker.scale.y = 0.05;
39  marker.scale.z = 0.05;
40  marker.color.r = 1.0;
41  marker.color.g = 0.0;
42  marker.color.b = 0.0;
43  marker.color.a = 1.0;
44  marker.header.frame_id = "/world";
45  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE;
46  marker.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
47  marker.pose.orientation.y = 0.0;
48  marker.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
49  marker.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
50 
51  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
52  marker.id = 0;
53  marker.pose.position.x = 0.0;
54  marker.pose.position.y = 0.0;
55  marker.pose.position.z = 0.0;
56 }
57 
58 ProximityVisualizer::~ProximityVisualizer() {
59 }
60 
61 void ProximityVisualizer::Callback(const ros_robotic_skin::PointArray::ConstPtr& msg) {
62  // Delete all points from previous callback
63  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::DELETEALL;
64  marker_array.markers.push_back(marker);
65  pub.publish<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>(marker_array);
66  marker_array.markers.clear();
67 
68  // Add new points
69  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
70  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
71  for (int i = 0; i < msg->points.size(); i++) {
72  // Check that it's not 'nan' or 'inf'
73  marker.id = i;
74  marker.pose.position.x = msg->points[i].x;
75  marker.pose.position.y = msg->points[i].y;
76  marker.pose.position.z = msg->points[i].z;
77  marker_array.markers.push_back(marker);
78  }
79  pub.publish<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>(marker_array);
80  marker_array.markers.clear();
81 }
82 
83 void ProximityVisualizer::start() {
84  ros::spin();
85 }
86 
87 void ProximityVisualizer::stop() {
88  ROS_INFO("Shutting down...");
89  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::DELETEALL;
90  marker_array.markers.push_back(marker);
91  pub.publish<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>(marker_array);
92  ROS_INFO("Deleted all points");
93  ros::shutdown();
94 }
95 
96 void on_shutdown(int sig) {
97  ProximityVisualizer end_visualizer;
98  end_visualizer.stop();
99 }
100 
101 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
102  ros::init(argc, argv, "proximity_visualizer", ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler);
103  ProximityVisualizer proximity_visualizer;
104  proximity_visualizer.start();
105 }
